content.prompt: Which statement best describes the effect in line 18 (“Large . . . grass”) ?

choices.label: It encourages a humorous view of the grasshopper’s predicament.
It contradicts the hyperbole of the speaker’s claims.
It introduces the speaker’s criticism of the grasshopper.
It emphasizes the impermanence of an earlier situation.

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Identify and explain the function of a simile.
